item.title: Multi-account work on GitHub or GitLab.
item.description: Multitple accounts There are situations that you need to work with multiple accounts on GitHub (or GitLab) and use each of them independently of each other. When that happens you might run into problem that each accounts has it’s own SSH key uploaded and when you try to connect to your non default account you get an error message saying “Permission denied!”. All of that happened to and below you my solution to it.
